turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How can I be of assistance?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like order two small pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to get them from Bella Luna, but the toppings I want is pepperoni on one and meat lovers for the other one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's a classic and a meat lovers, both mediums right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. A pepperoni and a meat lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A classic is pepperoni and cheese.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. So, I want a pepperoni and a meat lovers and I want them both small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay so that's a small pepperoni and a small meatlovers, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want them with thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, so that's 2 small pizzas with thick crust, one pepperoni and one meatlovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your Pizza Will be ready in 30 minutes, enjoy!
